review: Absolutely the easiest set up I've ever had! We love this product! I'd recommend it to everyone!
author: Tracie

review: The Amazon Fire Stick was as easy as advertised to set up, even for a technology challenged person like myself. I haven't utilized it a whole lot yet, but we have some long,cold winters here in Minnesota so it will get used a whole lot then. I'm looking forward to streaming some TV shows that I haven't seen as well as some really good movies.
author: Alice Knowles

review: It's great and does the job
author: Tina Hanna

review: The remote is very easy to lose.  And while most of my apps work great on it, there are a few important ones that have some trouble.
author: Michael Allred

review: Great product. I have 2. One for home and one for travel. Love the feature that lets you authenticate to hotel's internet.
author: JC Lima
